apihelp-redirectmanager-summary: Manage redirects to pages (with the [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Extension:RedirectManager|RedirectManager extension]]).
apihelp-redirectmanager-param-redirect: The name of the redirect, the source page name.
apihelp-redirectmanager-param-target: The page to which the redirect will point, the destination page name.
apihelp-redirectmanager-example-1: Redirect a Manual of Style shortcut to its actual page.
